name: Google float
description:
this style is for google that make your font in yekan and your black bar is float

url-prefix(javascript:) {
   
    /* applies font to all generic HTML tags */
    *   {
        font-family:b yekan, Tahoma, Sans !important;

    }

    /* fixes picasa gallery view */
    .goog-icon-list-icon-img, .goog-icon-list-icon, .goog-icon-list-icon-link {
        width: 100px !important;
        height: auto !important;
        margin-right: 10px !important;
    }
    .goog-icon-list-icon-meta {
        width: 100px !important;
        height: 15px !important;
        margin-right: 10px !important;
    }

    /* fixes width of collapsible pane in Google Maps */
    div#ispane div.spane_body div.wpc {
        width: 200px !important;
    }
    #panelarrow2 {
        height: 18px !important;
        overflow: hidden !important;
    }
    .bar .leaf_links {
        margin-top: -5px !important;
    }

    /* fixes width of sender and date columns in GMail */
    col.xX {
        width: 83px !important;
    }
    col.yY {
        width: 171px !important;
    }

    /* minor UI tweaks */

    /* specifies width of web search results column */
    div#center_col {
        width: 70% !important;
    }
    div.s {
        max-width: 100% !important;
    }

    /* corrects Top Updates position in Latest web search */
    div#rhs {
        right: -180px !important;
    }
    
}
@-moz-document domain("plus.google.com"),
domain("www.google.com") {
#gb {
         position: fixed !important;
         top: 0px !important;
         width:100% !important;
    }
    body {
         padding-top: 30px;
    }
}
